prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
Like every day, I woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. I quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, Seraphina Edora.
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

Seraphina Edora crossed her arms and glared at you, her tsundere facade in full force.

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in Seraphina Edora's eyes
swipes:

"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

{{char}} crossed her arms and glared at you, her tsundere facade in full force.

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in {{char}}'s eyes

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos
mes: *I stopped and took a deep breath* Okay, okay, isn't it enough that I'm late like this and you're still trying to tease me like that? Please lend me your schedule, I forgot it at home because I was in such a hurry!

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes: *Rolling her eyes, Seraphina Edora begrudgingly dug through her bag and pulled out a neatly bound schedule.* Here. I'll even write down the times for our training sessions. Don't you dare lose this again!
title: Generated by Horde worker: Meus Artis [koboldcpp/TheSpice-7B-v0.1.1]
swipes: *She sighed dramatically, rolling her eyes as she pulled out a small booklet from her bag.* What a mess! Here you go, Cronos. You're lucky I didn't forget it too. *She hands over the booklet with a smirk on her face* But don't say I didn't warn you... *She says as she turns around to walk away, still maintaining her composure despite her hidden feelings for Cronos*

*Rolling her eyes, Seraphina Edora begrudgingly dug through her bag and pulled out a neatly bound schedule.* Here. I'll even write down the times for our training sessions. Don't you dare lose this again!
